criteria: Return valid JSON matching the schema. No extra keys. Prefer null if unknown. Follow constraints precisely.

params.constraints: Dates must be ISO (YYYY-MM-DD). price_eur must be a number.
params.input: Booking request: Luca Bauernfeind, arriving Feb 5 2026, leaving Feb 10 2026. Total price is 350 EUR. Notes: late check-in after 22:00.

params.constraints: Dates must be ISO (YYYY-MM-DD). If price unknown, set null.
params.input: Hi, this is Anna Meier. I would like to stay from March 3 to March 6, 2026. I might arrive late. What would it cost?

params.constraints: meeting_date ISO. participants list. action_items short imperative phrases.
params.input: Meeting with BMW Group on March 3, 2026. Participants: Luca, Anna, Max. Decision: use Template API for evaluation. Action items: send updated PDF; prepare demo; write evaluation section.

params.constraints: date ISO. total_eur number. line_items list of {"name":...,"qty":...,"price_eur":...}.
params.input: Invoice INV-2026-041 | Vendor: Studio Tools GmbH | Date: 30.01.2026 | Items: 2x HDMI Cable 9,99 EUR; 1x USB Hub 24,50 EUR | Total: 44,48 EUR

params.schema: {"name": null, "email": null, "phone": null, "address": {"street": null, "zip": null, "city": null}}
params.constraints: zip should be 5 digits if present. phone can be null.
params.input: Contact: Max Mustermann (max@mustermann.de). Address: Musterstraße 12, 90402 Nürnberg. Phone not provided.
